title: Cows take over playground in Velva
content: VELVA, N.D. - Call it a bovine surprise in the Star City.    A couple of cows on the loose took over the playground in Velva Saturday morning.    Viewers spotted the cows around 10 a.m. during the city’s garage sale.    Several cows reportedly got loose and were roaming around the area.    Residents tracked down the owner who was able to wrangle the animals up.    (Photo courtesy: Amy Nelson)
